channel.title: Customer panel for my website having register/login issue
channel.description:
:white_check_mark: I agree that **I will not ask for help with non-KeyAuth related topics**, this community site **is only for asking about the default KeyAuth example with NO changes made to it**
Hello, i added the customer panel to my site and i am using the demo seller account to connect to it, but when i try to register nothing seems to happen, i try to login and nothing happens either.

item.title: Customer panel for my website having register/login issue
item.dc:creator: cxrrupted
item.description:
fixed it. but how do i add custom domain to the customer panel i am hosting? rn it has /Customer-Panel/index.php but i want to change this to something else, i followed the youtube video about this and it works to a certain extent but i want to use my modified php code ( i edited the stle and design to the pages ) the youtube video when followed and using the custom domain the login forms are default

Read full topic
item.source: Customer panel for my website having register/login issue
